content: seamless garter tassel booties designed by karen strauss p attern was developed because i fell in love with the little garter ear flap hat by purl bee http //www purlbee com/the-purl- bee/2014/1/23/lauras-loop-garter- ear-flap-hat html and wanted booties to match as a gift i wanted them seamless knit from the sole up and in the round i couldn t find a pattern that appealed to me so here are the little booties i designed the larger size is compatible with the baby size hat but i felt a smaller pair would also be fun to include they are so easy and take about three hours to make perfect for that last minute shower gift they requirements start with judy s magic cast on and are knit in the sizes 0-3 mos -3 25 round i wrote the pattern for magic loop or two 3-6 mos -3 75 circulars but there are instructions for converting to yarn worsted weight approx 50 yds for small size dpn s uses small amount of yarn excellent for a and 65 yds for larger size stash busting project yarn used small size knit picks brava color cream large size spud & chloe sweater color 7524 needles 4 5mm and 5 0mm or size to give you gauge for magic loop circular needle needs to be at least 80 cm/32 gauge 18 sts per 4 /10cm in garter with smaller needles notions five stitch markers one of them locking yarn needle for free hat pattern see purl bee link above begin you will be in a position to knit the sts together through the back loop k2tog through the back loop repeat * across sole until all sts are bound off weave in ends and roll down cuff cast on 21 25 sts using judy s magic cast
